about_meta: WackyFoki is a platform for sharing weird and unique recipes from around the world.
about_p1: WackyFoki is a community-based platform where people around the world share bizarre and unique recipes. We aim to create a space to document and enjoy creative and quirky foods that go beyond traditional tastes.
about_p2: Anyone can easily upload recipes, view others' creations, and leave comments and likes. Just because it looks weird doesn't mean it tastes bad!
about_p3: This is an open space for those who want to share new perspectives on food through fun and creativity. WackyFoki welcomes such moments.
about_p4: This platform is designed for anyone interested in cooking‚Äîfrom professional chefs to beginners, and even those who are just curious about unusual dishes.
about_p5: We believe that even experimental, unconventional, or silly recipes are valuable expressions of creativity. These dishes are not just meals‚Äîthey are stories and connections.
about_p6: WackyFoki dreams of being more than a recipe-sharing site. It's a digital food playground where we discover, record, laugh, and talk about the world's quirky food culture.
about_p7: Your feedback makes this platform better. Comments, likes, and suggestions all help build a warmer space. Share your unique recipe anytime!
about_p8: We will continue to run a community full of imagination and creativity, respecting diverse views on food. We believe these small experiments can lead to global sharing.
about_ops_body: This site is a personal project, and some revenue may be generated through Google AdSense and affiliate programs. The copyright of each post belongs to the author, and inappropriate content may be removed without prior notice. Contact:
about_notice: ‚Äª This platform is based on user-generated content, and the admin may delete inappropriate content without prior warning.
privacy_intro:
WackyFoki (hereinafter ‚ÄòService‚Äô) values your privacy and complies with the Personal Information Protection Act.
This policy describes how the Service collects, uses, and protects your personal information.
privacy_section1_content:
We collect the following information during Google login:
- Name, email address, profile photo
privacy_section2_content: We collect information through Google OAuth during user authentication.
privacy_section3_content:
Collected information is used for:
- Login and user identification
- Personalized content
privacy_section4_content: When the user deletes their account or upon request, the information is immediately deleted.
privacy_section5_content: We do not disclose user data to third parties except where legally required.
privacy_section6_content: We may use cookies provided by Google Analytics and AdSense for ad analytics and visitor tracking.
privacy_section7_content:
For questions about your privacy, please contact us at:
üìß contact@wackyfoki.com
terms_intro: These Terms govern the rights, responsibilities, and obligations between WackyFoki (the ‚ÄòService‚Äô) and its users.
terms_1_content: These terms define the conditions of use, procedures, and responsibilities related to the WackyFoki service.
terms_2_content:
Definitions used herein:
1. 'User' refers to anyone using the service in accordance with these terms.
2. 'Content' refers to uploaded images, text, video links, etc.
terms_3_content: These terms take effect upon being posted. We may revise them in accordance with the law and will notify users in advance.
terms_4_content: WackyFoki allows users to upload and browse unique recipes via a content-based platform.
terms_5_content: The service may be temporarily suspended for maintenance, emergencies, or other necessary reasons, with prior notice.
terms_6_content:
Users must not:
- Steal others‚Äô personal information
- Post false content
- Violate copyrights or rights of others
- Engage in immoral or unlawful conduct
terms_7_content: Copyright of user-generated content belongs to the user. The service may display it for non-commercial purposes.
terms_8_content: We are not responsible for the accuracy or reliability of user content, nor for disputes between users.
alert_invalid_image_format: Only JPG, PNG, and WebP formats are allowed.
contact_p1: Have questions about WackyFoki? For partnerships, bug reports, or feedback, feel free to contact us via the email below.
contact_owner_body: This site is personally operated by OriJin and is currently a test project. Contact: contact@wackyfoki.com
contact_response_guide: We usually respond within 48 hours. We value all feedback and reports.
contact_privacy_notice: Your email will only be used to respond to your inquiry and will never be shared. See our privacy policy for more details.
contact_inquiry_report: Report Content: Inappropriate recipes or comments
contact_meta: This is WackyFoki's contact page. Partnerships, bug reports, and feedback are always welcome.
contact_notice: Please select the appropriate inquiry type for faster service.
